LanguageData.Defaults_AcceptRoyalFavorDesc:
Whether you wish to be rewarded with {0} from {1}.

If this is disabled, {1} will offer other types of rewards instead.

This setting only affects newly-arriving quests.
LanguageData.Defaults_AcceptGoodwillDesc:
Whether you wish to be rewarded via improved faction relations with {0}.

If this is disabled, {0} will offer other types of rewards instead.

This setting only affects newly-generated quests.
LanguageData.Defaults_PlantTypeTip: The default plant type for new growing zones.
